sections: Last month, President Donald Trump seemed to invoke the memory of the 2000 election debacle when he
he believed the Supreme Court would decide the outcome of the 2020 election. That dredged up painful memories of an election that was stolen by Republicans.
Could that happen again? The new HBO documentary

implicitly asks that question as it reviews the fateful election in Florida 20 years ago. The film unearths the history of local Florida politics and GOP’s Orwellian tactics to try to halt vote counting in the name of protecting democracy.
This must-see film is out today.
caught up with its director Billy Corben to discuss the ongoing legacy of the 2000 election, and what has — and has not — changed since the debacle.
